text: Ani jevha ibrahima mhanale, ‘‘he majhya palanakartya! Mala dakhava ki tu melelyala kasa prakare jivanta karasila?’’ Allahane pharmavile, ‘‘kaya tumace (ya gostivara) imana nahi?’’ Uttara dile, ‘‘imana tara ahe, parantu asane majhya manala samadhana labhela.’’ Allahane pharmavile, ‘‘cara paksi ghya. Tyance tukade karuna taka, maga pratyeka parvatavara tyanca eka eka his'sa thevuna dya, nantara tyanna haka mara, te tumacya javala dhavata yetila ani januna asa ki allaha motha jabaradasta hikamata rakhanara ahe.’’
